subject: Winters coming!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Besides trying to get the boxes done, I'm trying to make a wall with a
door to seal out the north wind.  The outside of the wall faces north. The
door was like a double barn door with about an inch gap all the way around
it--burrrrrrrrr!  I re-used the existing door panels, ever try to put a door
knob in ply wood?
